段: 無醉毋知酒的滋味，無愛毋知情是啥麼，若毋是心愛的欲離開，心情也袂即稀微。看別人啉酒是心歡喜，怎樣我啉酒來痲痺？啊！啉落去啉落去，傷心也著啉落去，啊！為你醉今夜又閣為你醉。

bo5 chui3 m7 chai chiu2 e5 chu-bi7, bo5-ai3 m7 chai cheng5 si7 siann2-mih8, na7 m7 si7 sim-ai3--e5 beh li7-khui, sim-cheng5 ia7 boe7 chiah hi-bi5. khoann3 pat8-lang5 lim-chiu2 si7 sim hoann-hi2, chainn2-iunn7 goa2 lim-chiu2 lai5 ba5-pi3? ah! Lim--loh8-khi3 lim--loh8-khi3, siong-sim ia7 tioh8 lim--loh8-khi3, ah! ui7 li2 chui3 kim-ia7 iu7 koh ui7 li2 chui3.
無醉毋知酒的滋味，無愛毋知情是啥麼，若毋是心愛的欲離開，心情也袂即稀微。看別人啉酒是心歡喜，怎樣我啉酒來痲痺？啊！啉落去啉落去，傷心也著啉落去，啊！為你醉今夜又閣為你醉。

bo5 chui3 m7 chai chiu2 e5 chu-bi7, bo5-ai3 m7 chai cheng5 si7 siann2-mih8, na7 m7 si7 sim-ai3--e5 beh li7-khui, sim-cheng5 ia7 boe7 chiah hi-bi5. khoann3 pat8-lang5 lim-chiu2 si7 sim hoann-hi2, chainn2-iunn7 goa2 lim-chiu2 lai5 ba5-pi3? ah! Lim--loh8-khi3 lim--loh8-khi3, siong-sim ia7 tioh8 lim--loh8-khi3, ah! ui7 li2 chui3 kim-ia7 iu7 koh ui7 li2 chui3.
看別人啉酒是心歡喜，怎樣我啉酒來痲痺？啊！啉落去啉落去，傷心也著啉落去，啊！為你醉今夜又閣為你醉。

khoann3 pat8-lang5 lim-chiu2 si7 sim hoann-hi2, chainn2-iunn7 goa2 lim-chiu2 lai5 ba5-pi3? ah! Lim--loh8-khi3 lim--loh8-khi3, siong-sim ia7 tioh8 lim--loh8-khi3, ah! ui7 li2 chui3 kim-ia7 iu7 koh ui7 li2 chui3.
今夜的月娘掛天頂，你我形影雙雙佇水墘。天星閃閃送來好情意，心情輕鬆快樂的暗暝。今夜的月娘笑瞇瞇，你我相倚牽手行海邊。海風陣陣吹送著芳味，溫柔滿腹歡喜的暗暝。看著你可愛的模樣，心裡唱出甘蜜的歌詩。

kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-niu5 koa3 thinn-teng2, li2 goa2 heng5-iann2 sang-sang ti7 chui2 kinn5. thinn-chhinn siam2-sih sang3 lai5 ho2 cheng5-i3, sim-cheng5 khin-sang khoai3-lok8 e5 am3-mi5. kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-niu5 chhio3-bi5-bi5, li2 goa2 sio-oa2 khan-chhiu2 kiann5 hai2-pinn. hai2-hong chun7-chun7 chhoe-sang3 tioh8 phang-bi7, un-jiu5 moa2-pak hoann-hi2 e5 am3-mi5. khoann3 tioh8 li2 kho2-ai3 e5 bou5-iunn7, sim--nih8 chhiunn3 chhut kam-bit8 e5 koa-si.
無論是海角抑是遙遠的天邊，阮欲跟你去，因為你對阮有情意，心裡輕輕叫這你名字。希望你的心親像今夜的月娘，又圓又芳甜。

bo5-lun7 si7 hai2-kak iah8 si7 iau5-oan2 e5 thinn-pinn, goan2 boeh toe3 li2 khi3, in-ui7 li2 tui3 goan2 u7 cheng5-i3, sim--nih8 khin-khin kio3 che li2 mia5-ji7. hi-bong7 li2 e5 sim chhin-chhiunn7 kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-niu5, iu7 inn5 iu7 phang-tinn.
今夜的月娘光又圓，你我愛情可比樹箬青。花蕊紅紅祝福咱將來，滿心美夢溫暖的暗暝。
kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-niu5 kng iu7 inn5, li2 goa2 ai3-cheng5 kho2-pi2 chhiu7-hioh8 chhenn. hoe-lui2 ang5-ang5 chiok-hok lan2 chiong-lai5, moa2-sim bi2-bang7 un-loan2 e5 am3-mi5.
今夜的月光照入窗邊，予阮時常想起你。自從彼幾工分開到如今，閣來予咱閣相見。今夜的月光照入窗邊，予阮想起彼當時。阮離開故鄉每日思念你，希望成功倒轉去。一封的批信一張的相片，阮也感覺心裡真歡喜。感謝你的情感謝你的愛，阮也深深囥踮佇心裡。今夜的月光快樂的暗暝，希望永遠來做陣。愛情的滋味酸甘甜蜜，我會永遠陪伴你。

kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-kng chiau3 jip8 thang-pinn, hou7 gun2 si5-siong5 siunn7-khi2 li2. chu7 chiong5 hit kui2 kang pun-khui kau3 ju5-kim,koh lai5 hou7 lan2 koh sio-kian3. kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-kng chiau3 jip8 thang-pinn, hou7 gun2 siunn7 khi2 hit-tong-si5. goan2 li7-khui kou3-hiong mui2-jit8 su-liam7 li2, hi-bong7 seng5-kong to3-tng2--khi3. chit8 hong e5 phoe-sin3 chit8 tiunn e5 siong3-phinn3, gun2 ia7 kam2-kak sim--nih8 chin hoann-hi2. kam2-sia7 li2 e5 cheng5 kam2-sia7 li2 e5 ai3,gun2 ia7 chhim-chhim khng3 tiam3 ti7 sim--nih8. kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-kng khoai3-lok8 e5 am3-mi5, hi-bong7 eng2-oan2 lai5 choe3-tin7. ai3-cheng5 e5 chu-bi7 soan-kam-tinn-bit8, goa2 e7 eng2-oan2 poe5-phoann7 li2.
今夜的月光照入窗邊，予阮時常想起你。阮離開故鄉每日思念你，希望成功倒轉去。一封的批信一張的相片，阮也感覺心裡真歡喜。感謝你的情感謝你的愛，阮也深深匟踮佇心裡。今夜的月光快樂的暗暝，希望永遠來做陣。

kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-kng chiau3 jip8 thang-pinn, hou7 gun2 si5-siong5 siunn7-khi2 li2. goan2 li7-khui kou3-hiong mui2-jit8 su-liam7 li2, hi-bong7 seng5-kong to3-tng2--khi3. chit8 hong e5 phoe-sin3 chit8 tiunn e5 siong3-phinn3, gun2 ia7 kam2-kak sim--nih8 chin hoann-hi2. kam2-sia7 li2 e5 cheng5 kam2-sia7 li2 e5 ai3, gun2 ia7 chhim-chhim khong3 tiam3 ti7 sim--nih8. kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-kng khoai3-lok8 e5 am3-mi5, hi-bong7 eng2-oan2 lai5 choe3-tin7.
愛情的滋味酸甘甜蜜，我會永遠陪伴你。今夜的月光快樂的暗暝，希望永遠來做陣。愛情的滋味酸甘甜蜜，我會永遠陪伴你。

ai3-cheng5 e5 chu-bi7 soan-kam-tinn-bit8, goa2 e7 eng2-oan2 poe5-phoann7 li2. kim-ia7 e5 goeh8-kng khoai3-lok8 e5 am3-mi5, hi-bong7 eng2-oan2 lai5 choe3-tin7. ai3-cheng5 e5 chu-bi7 soan-kam-tinn-bit8, goa2 e7 eng2-oan2 poe5-phoann7 li2.
今暗我欲唱歌，我知影你會孤單，等一下咧仔我免閣偌久，我就隨轉去你身邊佮你做伴，等我唱煞。
kim-am3 goa2 beh chhiunn3-koa, goa2 chai-iann2 li2 e7 kou-toann, tan2 chit8 e7 leh8--a2 goa2 bian2 koh loa7 ku2, goa2 chiu7 sui5 tng2 khi3 li2 sin-pinn kah li2 cho3-phoann7, tan2 goa2 chhiunn3-soah.
你一个人過了好嗎？我的姊妹啊！直直共我叫，今暗我只想欲好好也唱歌，希望希望你也鬥陣來聽，歌聲好迷人，舞步好輕鬆，佇茲笑容滿滿，你來參兩句，酒有幾落手，這條歌人人攏底搶，一首點一首。

li2 chit8 e5 lang5 koe3 liau2 ho2--ma? goa2 e5 chi2-be7 ah! tit8-tit8 ka7 goa2 kio3, kim-am3 goa2 chi2 siunn7 beh ho2-ho2 a2 chhiunn3-koa, hi-bong7 hi-bong7 li2 ia7 tau3-tin7 lai5 thiann, koa-siann ho2 be5-lang5, bu2-pou7 ho2 khin-sang, ti7 chia chhio3-iong5 moa2-moa2, li2 lai5 chham nng7 ku3, chiu2 u7 kui2-loh8 chhiu2, chit tiau5 koa lang5-lang5 long2 teh chhiunn2, chit8 siu2 tiam2 chit8 siu2.
今暗我欲唱歌，我知影你會孤單，等一下仔我歌聲好迷人，舞步好輕鬆，佇茲笑容滿滿，你來參兩句，酒有幾落手，這條歌人人攏底搶。

kim-am3 goa2 beh chhiunn3-koa, goa2 chai-iann2 li2 e7 kou-toann, tan2 chit8 e7--a2 goa2 koa-siann ho2 be5-lang5, bu2-pou7 ho2 khin-sang, ti7 chia chhio3-iong5 moa2-moa2, li2 lai5 chham nng7 ku3, chiu2 u7 kui2-loh8 chhiu2, chit tiau5 koa lang5-lang5 long2 teh chhiunn2.
你一个人過了好嗎？我的姊妹啊！直直共我叫，愛人啊！你閣小等一下，因為今夜咱欲唱規暗。
li2 chit8 e5 lang5 koe3 liau2 ho2--ma? goa2 e5 chi2-be7 ah! tit8-tit8 ka7 goa2 kio3, ai3-jin5 ah! li2 koh sio2 tan2 chit8 e7, in-ui7 kim-ia7 lan2 beh chhiunn3 kui-am3.
為你心碎暗悲傷，面上失去了笑容，滿腹的心事滿腹的苦衷，啥人是我訴苦的對象？自暴自棄展酒量，燒酒啉甲真勉強，感情若是欲受創傷，可比大船失去了方向，當初的你講阮屆高尚，如今的你呀變心無死忠。

ui7 li2 sim chhui3 am3 pi-siong, bin7-siong7 sit-khi3 liau2 chhio3-iong5, moa2-pak e5 sim-su7 moa2-pak e5 khou2-thiong, siann2 lang5 si7 goa2 sou3-khou2 e5 tui3-siong7? chu7-pauh chu7-khi3 tian2 chiu2-liong7, sio-chiu2 lim kap chin bian2-kiong2, kam2-cheng5 na7 si7 beh siu7 chhong3-siong, kho2-pi2 toa7 chun5 sit-khi3 liau2 hong-hiong3, tong-chhou e5 li2 kong2 gun2 kai3 ko-siong7, ju5-kim e5 li2 ia pian3-sim bo5 si2-tiong.
為你心碎暗悲傷，面上失去了笑容，滿腹的心事滿腹的苦衷，啥人是我訴苦的對象？自暴自棄展酒量，燒酒啉甲真勉強，感情若是欲受創傷，可比大船失去了方向，當初的你講阮屆高尚，如今的你呀變心無死忠。

ui7 li2 sim chhui3 am3 pi-siong, bin7-siong7 sit-khi3 liau2 chhio3-iong5, moa2-pak e5 sim-su7 moa2-pak e5 khou2-thiong, siann2 lang5 si7 goa2 sou3-khou2 e5 tui3-siong7? chu7-pauh chu7-khi3 tian2 chiu2-liong7, sio-chiu2 lim kap chin bian2-kiong2, kam2-cheng5 na7 si7 beh siu7 chhong3-siong, kho2-pi2 toa7 chun5 sit-khi3 liau2 hong-hiong3, tong-chhou e5 li2 kong2 gun2 kai3 ko-siong7, ju5-kim e5 li2 ia pian3-sim bo5 si2-tiong.
自暴自棄展酒量，燒酒啉甲真勉強，感情若是欲受創傷，可比大船失去了方向，當初的你講阮屆高尚，如今的你呀變心無死忠。

chu7-pauh chu7-khi3 tian2 chiu2-liong7, sio-chiu2 lim kap chin bian2-kiong2, kam2-cheng5 na7 si7 beh siu7 chhong3-siong, kho2-pi2 toa7 chun5 sit-khi3 liau2 hong-hiong3, tong-chhou e5 li2 kong2 gun2 kai3 ko-siong7, ju5-kim e5 li2 ia pian3-sim bo5 si2-tiong.
阮就是青春的內山的兄哥，七八早著出門，準備欲去巡田園。正手舉鋤頭倒手提畚箕，行路輕鬆有元氣。行到我的田園邊，聽人講台北都市，光景真怪奇好趁錢呢。

goan2 chiu7-si7 chheng-chhun e5 lai7-soann e5 hiann-ko, chhit peh cha2 tioh8 chhut-mng5, chun2-pi7 beh khi3 sun5 chhan5-hng5. chiann3-chhiu2 kiah8 ti5-thau5 to3-chhiu2 theh8 pun3-ki, kiann5-lou7 khin-sang u7 goan5-khi3. kiann5 kau3 goa2 e5 chhan5-hng5 pinn, thiann lang5 kong2 tai5-pak tou-chhi7, kong-keng2 chin koai3-ki5 ho2 than3-chinn5 ni5.
阮就是青春的內山的兄哥，坐這台鐵牛車，準備欲去遊都市。腳是穿草鞋頭殼戴草笠，搖來搖去真有勢。蹣山過嶺又過溪，若去到台北都市，我欲買東西倒轉去呢。

goan2 chiu7-si7 chheng-chhun e5 lai7-soann e5 hiann-ko, che7 chit tai5 thih gu5-chhia, chun2-pi7 beh khi3 iu5 tou-chhi7. kha si7 chheng7 chhau2-e5 thau5-khak te3 chhau2-leh8, io5 lai5 io5 khi3 chin u7 si3. poann5 soann ke3 nia2 iu7 koe3 khe, na7 khi3 kau3 tai5-pak tou-chhi7, goa2 beh be2 tang-sai to3-tng2--khi3 nih.
阮就是青春的內山的兄哥，第一次到台北，實在有影好七桃。無論新公園圓山動物園，人山人海滿滿是。逐家都是笑瞇瞇，予我來感覺爽快，無想倒轉去倒轉去呢。

goan2 chiu7-si7 chheng-chhun e5 lai7-soann e5 hiann-ko, te7-it chhu3 kau3 tai5-pak, sit8-chai7 u7-iann2 ho2 thit-tho5. bo5-lun7 Sin-kong-hng5 Inn5-soann Tong7-but8-hng5, jin5-soann jin5-hai2 moa2-moa2-si7. tak8-ke to si7 chhio3-bi5-bi5, hou7 goa2 lai5 kam2-kak song2-khoai3, bo5 siunn7 to3-tng2--khi3 to3-tng2--khi3 nih.
裡山的小野和尚，深山林內偷走出來。講欲遊街，頭殼縛著一條頭巾，四界一直踅。對小姐底講話，伊嘛欲虧，搖搖擺擺踮佇路邊，燒酒啉一杯。人講伊小和尚真笑科，啥麼代誌無論啥貨，逐項伊嘛會。

lai7-soann e5 sio2 ia2 hoe5-siunn7, chhim-soann-na5-lai7 thau-chau2--chhut-lai5. kong2 beh iu5-ke, thau5-khak pak8 tioh8 chit8 tiau5 thau5-kin, si3-koe3 it-tit8 seh8. tui3 sio2-chia2 teh kong2-oe7, i ma7 beh khoe, io5-io5-pai2-pai2 tiam3 ti7 lou7-pinn, sio-chiu2 lim chit8 poe. lang5 kong2 i sio2 hoe7-siunn7 chin chhio3-khoe, siann2-mih8 tai7-chi3 bo5-lun7 siann2-hoe3, tak8-hang7 i ma7 oe7.
內山的小野和尚，對阮表示伊的經過。假若受罪，孤單一个踮佇廟寺，鬱卒頭犁犁。一生應該好好拍拚享受一切，出家食菜阿彌陀佛，唸經花花，無豬肉無雞肉通食，拍歹身體，伊才看破彼款生活，毋是愛違背。

lai7-soann e5 sio2 ia2 hoe5-siunn7, tui3 gun2 piau2-si7 i e5 keng-ke3. ka2-na2 siu7-choe7, kou-tan chit8 e5 tiam3 ti7 bio7-si7, ut-chut thau5 le5-le5. it-seng eng-kai ho2-ho2 phah-piann3 hiang2-siu7 it-chhe3, chhut-ke chiah8-chhai3 o-mi5-to5-put8, liam7 keng hoe-hoe, bo5 ti-bah bo5 koe-bah thang chiah8, phah phai2 sin-the2, i chiah khoann3 phoa3 hit khoan2 seng-oah8, m7 si7 ai3 ui5-poe7.
裡山的小野和尚，深山林內偷走出來。講欲遊街，頭殼縛著一條頭巾，四界一直踅。對小姐底講話，伊嘛欲虧，搖搖擺擺踮佇路邊，燒酒啉一杯。人講伊小和尚真笑科，啥麼代誌無論啥貨，逐項伊嘛會。

lai7-soann e5 sio2 ia2 hoe5-siunn7, chhim-soann-na5-lai7 thau-chau2--chhut-lai5. kong2 beh iu5-ke, thau5-khak pak8 tioh8 chit8 tiau5 thau5-kin, si3-koe3 it-tit8 seh8. tui3 sio2-chia2 teh kong2-oe7, i ma7 beh khoe, io5-io5-pai2-pai2 tiam3 ti7 lou7-pinn, sio-chiu2 lim chit8 poe. lang5 kong2 i sio2 hoe7-siunn7 chin chhio3-khoe, siann2-mih8 tai7-chi3 bo5-lun7 siann2-hoe3, tak8-hang7 i ma7 oe7.
就就就就就就，就就就就就就，彼个就是內山姑娘，生做真可愛又美麗。已經是十七八歲，青春的小姑娘迷人的烏色目睭，強壯的體骼予我來對伊會暗思慕，啊！裡山的小姑娘。

chiu7-chiu7-chiu7 chiu7-chiu7-chiu7,  chiu7-chiu7-chiu7 chiu7-chiu7-chiu7, hit e5 chiu7-si7 lai7-soann kou-niu5, senn-cho3 chin kho2-ai3 iu7 bi2-le7. i2-keng si7 chap8-chhit poeh he3, chheng-chhun e5 sio2 kou-niu5 be5-lang5 e5 ou-sek bak8-chiu, kiong5-chong3 e5 the2-keh hou7 goa2 lai5 tui3 i e7 am3 su-bou7, ah! lai7-soann e5 sio2 kou-niu5.
就就就就就就，就就就就就就，彼个就是內山姑娘，毋知你愛人有抑無。阮就是踮佇裡山未出嫁的姑娘，你若是真心愛意，請你來表示。但是我無勇氣來表示，啊！裡山的小姑娘。

chiu7-chiu7-chiu7 chiu7-chiu7-chiu7,  chiu7-chiu7-chiu7 chiu7-chiu7-chiu7, hit e5 chiu7-si7 lai7-soann kou-niu5, m7 chai li2 ai3-jin5 u7 a2 bo5. goan2 chiu7-si7 tiam3 ti7 lai7-soann be7 chhut-ke3 e5 kou-niu5, li2 na7 si7 chin sim ai3 i3, chhiann2 li2 lai5 piau2-si7, tan7-si7 goa2 bo5 iong2-khi3 lai5 piau2-si7, ah! lai7-soann e5 sio2 kou-niu5.
就就就就就就，就就就就就就，彼个就是內山姑娘，生做真活潑又天真。難忘的櫻花喙唇不時浮在我面前，若是來想伊形影，睏也睏未去害我來為伊底病相思，啊！內山的小姑娘。

chiu7-chiu7-chiu7 chiu7-chiu7-chiu7,  chiu7-chiu7-chiu7 chiu7-chiu7-chiu7, hit e5  chiu7-si7 lai7-soann kou-niu5, senn-cho3 chin hoat8-phoat iu7 thian-chin. lan5-bong5 e5 eng-hoe chhui3-tun5 put-si5 phu5 chai7 goa2 bin7-cheng5, na7 si7 lai5 siunn7 i heng5-iann2, khun3 ia7 khun3 be7 khi3 hai7 goa2 lai5 ui7 i teh pinn7 siunn-si, ah! lai7-soann e5 sio2 kou-niu5.
嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休，深山內迎花轎，鼓吹八音玲瓏叫，裡山的姑娘呀坐轎欲出嫁唷。唷扛轎的啊！小等咧唷。嘿休嘿休爐卡休，嘿休嘿休爐卡休。彼个內山小姑娘無情做伊上花轎，頭殼犁犁一直去，無聽後面我底叫。

heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, chhim-soann-lai7 ngia5 hoe-kio7, kou2-chhoe pat-im lin-long-kio3, lai7-soann e5 kou-niu5 ia che7-kio7 beh chhut-ke3 ioh8. ioh8 kng-kio7--e5 o3! sio2-tan2 leh ioh8.heh-sioh heh-sioh lou5-khah-sioh, heh-sioh heh-sioh lou5-khah-sioh. hit e5 lai7-soann sio2 kou-niu5 bo5-cheng5 cho3 i chiunn7 hoe-kio7, thau5-khak le5-le5 it-tit8 khi3, bo5 thiann au7-bin7 goa2 teh kio3.
嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休，毋知欲嫁去佗位，並無來對我講出到底啥原因，嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休，放捨我啊！嫁別人。嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休，盤山過嶺無歇睏，一庄過了又一庄。唷扛轎的啊！小等咧唷。嘿休嘿休爐卡休，嘿休嘿休爐卡休，希望最後見一面，拚甲大悸喘袂停，那知增差半分鐘，新娘已經上轎頂。

heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, m7 chai beh ke3 khi3 tah-ui7, peng7-bo5 lai5 tui3 goa2 kong2 chhut tau3-te2 siann2 goan5-in, heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, pang3-sak goa2 ah! ke3 pat8-lang5. Heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, poann5-soann koe3-nia2 bo5 hioh-khun3, chit8 chng ke3 liau2 iu7 chit8 chng. ioh8 kng-kio7--e5 o3! sio2-tan2 leh ioh8. heh-sioh heh-sioh lou5-khah-sioh, heh-sioh heh-sioh lou5-khah-sioh, hi-bong7 choe3-au7 kinn3 chit8 bin7, piann3 kah toa7 khui3 chhoan2 boe7 theng5, na2 chai cheng-chha poann3 hun-cheng, sin-niu5 i2-keng chiunn7-kio7 teng2.
嘿休嘿休嘿休爐卡休，不知不覺跟你去，無疑你並無斡頭予人想。嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休，出內山啊！嫁別人。唷扛轎的啊！小等咧唷。嘿休嘿休爐卡休，嘿休嘿休爐卡休，愛你熱情像火鼎，無時無陣霹噗滾，今日害我來失戀，可比有身無靈魂。

heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh lou5-khah-sioh, put-ti put-kak toe3 li2 khi3, bo5-gi5 li2 peng7-bo5 oat8-thau5 hou7 lang5 siunn7. heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, chhut lai7-soann ah! ke3 pat8-lang5. ioh8 kng-kio7--e5 o3! sio2-tan2 leh ioh8. heh-sioh heh-sioh lou5-khah-sioh, heh-sioh heh-sioh lou5-khah-sioh, ai3 li2 jiat8-cheng5 chhiunn7 he2-tiann2, bo5 si5 bo5 chun7 pe7-phok8 kun2, kim-jit8 hai7 goa2 lai5 sit-loan5, kho2-pi2 u7 sin bo5 leng5-hun5.
嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休，金金來送你離開，連一句都無安慰，害我病相思。嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休，心愛的啊！嫁別人，嘿休嘿休嘿休嘿休。深山內迎花轎，鼓吹八音玲瓏叫，內山的兄哥呀追甲汗那流啊！

heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, kim-kim lai5 sang3 li2 li7-khui, lian5 chit8 ku3 to bo5 an-ui3, hai7 goa2 pinn7 siunn-si. heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, sim-ai3--e5 o3! ke3 pat8-lang5, heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh heh-sioh, chhim-soann lai7 ngia5 hoe-kio7,kou2-chhoe pat-im lin-long-kio3, lai7-soann e5 hiann-ko ia tui kah koann7 na2 lau5 a3!
彼个內山小姑娘，無情做伊上花轎。頭殼犁犁一直去，無聽後面我底叫。哦哦咿!彼个可愛的內山姑娘，自從伊嫁了後已經幾落冬，阮心內也底怨嘆恁彼个都市的翁。希望伊會當照顧你共你相疼痛，阮踮佇內山每日底希望內山的姑娘內山的姑娘，幸福一世人。

hit e5 lai7-soann sio2 kou-niu5, bo5-cheng5 cho3 i siong7 hoe-kio7. thau5-khak le5-le5 it-tit8 khi3, bo5 thiann au7-bin7 goa2 teh kio3. ou5 ou5 i! hit e5 kho2-ai3 e5 lai7-soann kou-niu5, chu7-chiong5 i ke3 liau2-au7 i2-keng kui2 loh8 tang, gun2 sim-lai7 ia7 teh oan3-than3 lin2 hit e5 tou-chhi7 e5 ang. hi-bong7 i e7-tang3 chiau3-kou3 li2 ka7 li2 sio thiann3-thang3, gun2 tiam3 ti7 lai7-soann mui2-jit8 teh hi-bong7 lai7-soann e5 kou-niu5 lai7-soann e5 kou-niu5, heng7-hok chit8-si3-lang5.
有一日看著你穿甲媠噹噹，一手牽囝手牽著恁彼个真賢的翁，一時陣予阮心沉重，目箍漸漸紅，阮踮佇內山每日底希望內山的姑娘內山的姑娘，幸福一世人。

u7 chit8 jit8 khoann3 tioh8 li2 chheng7 kah sui2-tang-tang, chit8 chhiu2 khan kiann2 chhiu2 khan tioh8 lin2 hit e5 chin gau5 e5 ang, chit8-si5-chun7 hou7 gun2 sim tim5-tang7, bak8-khou chiam7-chiam7 ang5, gun2 tiam3 ti7 lai7-soann mui2-jit8 teh hi-bong7 lai7-soann e5 kou-niu5 lai7-soann e5 kou-niu5, heng7-hok chit8-si3-lang5.
自從伊嫁了後已經幾落冬，阮心裡也底怨嘆恁彼个都市的翁。希望伊會當照顧你共你相疼痛，阮踮佇裡山每日底希望內山的姑娘內山的姑娘，幸福一世人，幸福一世人。

chu7-chiong5 i ke3 liau2-au7 i2-keng kui2 loh8 tang, gun2 sim-lai7 ia7 teh oan3-than3 lin2 hit e5 tou-chhi7 e5 ang. hi-bong7 i e7-tang3 chiau3-kou3 li2 ka7 li2 sio thiann3-thang3, gun2 tiam3 ti7 lai7-soann mui2-jit8 teh hi-bong7 lai7-soann e5 kou-niu5 lai7-soann e5 kou-niu5, heng7-hok chit8-si3-lang5, heng7-hok chit8-si3-lang5.
